categories.name: Star Performer
categories.description: Exceptional individual contributor who consistently exceeds expectations

categories.name: Lead That Inspires
categories.description: Natural leader who motivates and guides team members
criteria: Effectively guides and mentors team members
Creates a positive and productive work environment
Inspires others to achieve their best

categories.name: Innovation Champion
categories.description: Employee who brings creative solutions and drives innovation

categories.name: Team Player Excellence
categories.description: Collaborative team member who enhances team dynamics

categories.name: Customer Hero
categories.description: Employee who delivers exceptional customer service

categories.name: Growth Catalyst

nominations.justification: John has consistently delivered exceptional results in our project. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills have been instrumental in meeting our deadlines. He often goes above and beyond to ensure quality, and his work has significantly contributed to our team's success. His ability to handle complex challenges while maintaining high standards is truly remarkable.
nominations.managerComments: Strong nomination with clear examples of exceptional performance.

nominations.justification: I have introduced several innovative solutions to improve our workflow efficiency. The new automation system I developed has reduced processing time by 40% and improved accuracy. I've also mentored team members on implementing these improvements, leading to broader organizational impact.

email-templates.name: leave-request
email-templates.subject: Leave Request {{status}} - {{employeeName}}

email-templates.name: leave-approved
email-templates.subject: Leave Request Approved - {{employeeName}}

email-templates.name: leave-rejected
email-templates.subject: Leave Request Rejected - {{employeeName}}

email-templates.name: performance-review
email-templates.subject: Performance Review Reminder - {{employeeName}}
email-templates.body:
Dear {{employeeName}},

This is a reminder that your performance review is due.

Period: {{reviewPeriod}}
Due Date: {{dueDate}}

Please complete your self-assessment at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
HR Team

email-templates.name: interview-scheduled
email-templates.subject: Interview Scheduled - {{position}}

email-templates.name: password-reset
email-templates.subject: Password Reset Request
email-templates.body:
Dear {{employeeName}},

You have requested to reset your password.

Click the link below to reset your password:
{{resetLink}}

This link will expire in 24 hours.

Best regards,
HR Team

email-template-variables.name: employeeName
email-template-variables.description: Name of the employee requesting leave

email-template-variables.name: action
email-template-variables.description: Action taken on the leave request

email-template-triggers.description: Triggered when a new leave request is submitted

Triggered when a leave request is rejected
